p.s: Angie Thomas talked about the impact a book can make on the reader.
I will give my opinion regarding to the film The Hate U Give in this text.
This movie had a big impact on me.
It shows the main problems of racism and the life of these victims in this situation.
It is interesting for me, that a movie can have a big impact, without using many special effects, but only the reality.
It is also interesting, that many things Maverick said are the truth.
In general Maverick as a person, who wanted to break the circle for his kids, is an interesting character.
In summary it can be said, that I think the movie had a big impact on me, by opening my eyes when it comes to racism and/or systematic racism.
